title.full: The Ballet of Light and Shadow
title.reduced: The Ballet of Light and Shadow

description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. In the burning light of a rainbow, fight the evil forces of shadows. Test your skills in four worlds of unique gameplay. Play in a dangerous ballet, detonate gears of shadows, avoid monstruous clouds and fight an epic war to liberate the rainbow from its foes.
description.short: In the burning light of a rainbow, fight the evil forces of shadows. Test your skills in four worlds of unique gameplay. Play in a dangerous ballet, detonate gears of shadows, avoid monstruous clouds and fight an epic war to liberate the rainbow from its foes.
